eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Eyjafjalla asks about a word she heard in her dreams, and Keller promises to tell her everything once the observation is over. The Little Black Sheep all disappear within the span of a night, causing Eyjafjalla to think they were all hallucinations. The Fashion Street residents finally agree to relocate, and they prepare for their big move.

attributes.content: A disaster! This is a disaster, I tell you!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: You call this interior design? No wonder no one hires Siestans for design work. This is a tourist destination, yet it has no architectural style of its own, and you don't even know how to copy someone else's properly!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: How could you sully the elegance of Victorian style like this? Look at this table. I said I wanted it to have a marble-like texture. Instead, you went with this cheap, low quality wood!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: Perhaps you should look at your budget and again see if you gave me enough for even half a slab of faux marble.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Hah! Alright. Looks like you don't quite understand your place, Miss Ann-Maier.
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: If it wasn't for me, you'd still be following the Sargonian caravans, fumbling your way around town! There's nothing stopping me from reporting you to the cops as an undocumented immigrant who illegally entered Columbia. Then, you won't see so much as a dime!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: If you do that, I'll report you for sheltering and hiring an illegal immigrant! Now pay me!
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Why... you!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: Hmph, what a foolish Siestan. So crude and disrespectful...
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: When the city's so stupid as to willingly gave up their obsidian mining industry, their bread and butter, there are bound to be citizens like you with no respect for others!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: (Money first... Yell at him only after you get the money...)
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Nothing to say? The tragic thing about you is that you haven't even realized Siesta's foolishness, and you're here shouting and accusing me!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: (I can't make nothing from this job. I need my traveling money...)
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: If you people had chosen to join Victoria all those years ago, you would long have become citizens of the empire, indulged in the opulence the empire has to offer, and found your place in the empire's grand history! Instead, you're here, trying to earn a bit of coin to get on your way...
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: Hmph, looks like you're at least savvy enough to understand my point.
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: Take this. It's your pay. Hmph, count it well. It's in Victorian pounds. You know the denominations, right? Don't you even think I'm trying to shortchange you, lest you make yourself seem ill-mannered.
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: Mister, you aren't deserving of my manners.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: You don't know anything about Siesta's history. You don't even know the first thing about the Victorian architectural history you're so proud of. What's more, Victoria's glory is all thanks to your ancestors' contributions. It hasn't got one bit to do with you.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Why don't you go take a look at the buildings in Victoria and see how Siesta's obsidian has changed your architectural style and become the kind of luxury commodity that you snobs adore so much?
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Who's the one with a narrow perspective here?
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Why you...!
attributes.name: Bankrupt Merchant

attributes.content: The Siestans closed off the mines to protect the environment. Everything we do, we do it for the sake of our homeland's future. Not like some stingy man who's just talking about the glorious past over and over to win himself respect.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: I'm going back to rebuild my homeland and help breathe new life into it, but what about you? What have you done for Victoria given the shape it's in these days?
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Ann-Maier curls her lips a little, and measures the thickness of the stack of bills with her hand.
Even the Columbian demolition crews pay more, oh noble employer.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: I only hope your tastes will help you make your comeback.
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Now cheerio!
attributes.name: Impoverished Girl

attributes.content: Need to go over anything again? It doesn't hurt to be careful.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Everything of value is still here, and the house is in one piece. That's good enough for me.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: I'll send you the reward I promised you. The exhibition-grade obsidian and the certificate will make it to you in probably two months.
attributes.name: Swire
Pelipper
attributes.content: That's great!

attributes.name: Pelipper
attributes.content: I'm looking forward to it.
The collector's eyes briefly lights up, though his excitement doesn't last particularly long.
Is there some kind of bewitching power to these obsidians that has you enthralled like this?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Are you interested in obsidian yourself? I suppose not... I've learned my lesson. There are very few people out there who truly have an eye for their beauty. Most with have their eyes on obsidians are up to no good!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Never mind. I shan't bother you any longer! Goodbye!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Mr. Pelipper Brown. Are you perhaps related to the bankrupt Siestan tycoon, Beat Brown?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't even mention that scary old man...
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: There may not be many who still remember him, but I'm sure he was much more well known back when obsidian was still Siesta's main export.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I spotted this name while I was going over the data. I didn't expect his successor to be running a little hot spring hotel in the area.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The volcano gave Siesta plenty of riches, and the hot springs are no less wonderful than the obsidian.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: The old man died a couple years ago. Oripathy.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: He never went anywhere close to the mines, but he got infected on his way to Columbia for vacation when the car's Originium engine broke down.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Oh... I'm sorry to hear...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: He wasn't really a good man, but his mines did create many jobs. If his protective measures were just a little more comprehensive, perhaps he would've won the gratitude of the miners.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: I've heard that when the government announced the ban on obsidian mining, your mines were the first ones to work toward shutting down.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What else was I supposed to do? The only alternative I had was to break the law.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Alright, Mr. Brown. I hope we'll get to work together again in the future. Your hot spring hotel is very spectacular. Would you perhaps be interested in developing it into a hot spring resort?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'll pass. I'd rather not go through all the ruckus—That is, unless you make me an offer that I truly can't refuse. Say, an even bigger obsidian that's even more pleasing to the eye.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Speaking of which... your obsidian collection here have all been delicately cut and polished. How come there's a geode that hasn't been polished whatsoever?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh... Don't you get any funny ideas about it.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: That thing's more expensive than all the pieces in the hotel combined.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Adele.
...Adele?
(Is this... Mutti's hand?)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (So warm...)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (Mutti... is stroking my shoulder...)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Wake up, Adele.
Adele, you mustn't sleep here. You'll catch a cold.
(I won't...)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (It's very warm... when you're here by my side.)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mutti...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Keller hides the surprised expression on her face and reaches her hand out to gently pat Adele's head.
Are you awake?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Oh... Professor Keller.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did I just...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Professor Keller! I fell asleep...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You seem exhausted.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Did you have a nightmare? Are you feeling unwell?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Or is it your illness...?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: I'm okay...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele sees that the elder scholar is looking at her with a worried expression. Her eyes are full of concern. During their short time together, she has never seen the stern scholar look so gentle.
Professor Keller... Could you tell me just...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Just what happened at William University all those years ago...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I don't understand, Adele. What are you asking?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: No, Adele. We have to go.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Yes. It's time.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We have to head back up the volcano before it starts to rain.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Rain...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller... Does the word 'rain' have any other meaning?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Silence.
Keller bites her lip, as though there is something that she wants to say, but she nonetheless swallows those words back down.
Adele... When this observation is over, I will tell you everything, alright?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly, you told me before that every Little Black Sheep is different. They... aren't just your clones, right...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are those dreams... really just dreams?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We've found the 'Northern Wind' and the 'Seed.' Will you give me all these answers if we find the 'Fur?'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Why does it seem like... everyone is hiding just about everything from me...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: There is no answer.
And unlike the mischievous kind of silence she got before, Adele can feel that something has truly disappeared from her side.
Adele looks around the empty exhibit hall, and finds the whistling rock specimen that was lost and then recovered a few days ago sitting where it has sat, having not moved an inch.
Mr. Dolly?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Good morning, Siesta. Today is August 21, 1099.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The humidity is 63%, visibility 12km, wind's blowing south-southwest. Estimated three days until volcanic eruption...
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The exciting time is almost upon us. How is everyone feeling? Who do you want to share the moment with?
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Did any of you forget anything back in Old Siesta? If you did—that's too bad. I mean, what's anyone supposed to do? You only have yourself to blame for being so careless in your move. It's all too late now!
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: But whatever the case may be, we should try to look at the bright side. It's only by casting away our old burdens that we can better welcome the future.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: 'You Go Your Way!'
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Let's get our day started with this song from the Reef Band.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Watch out, be careful. Hold that sign up. It's a bit heavy, so get a good grip.
attributes.name: Busy Voice

attributes.content: It's such an old sign. Since we're tearing things down anyway, can't we cut it up first before we take it down?
attributes.name: Exhausted Voice

attributes.content: Yeah, we may be tearing the place down and moving, but if Old Man Mockingbird were to find out about you cutting his sign down with an axe, he'd climb out of his grave and beat the living hell out of you.
attributes.name: Busy Voice

attributes.content: Stop complaining. 3—2—
attributes.name: Busy Voice

attributes.content: Mister, are all these instruments here discounted?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yeah, they're all as cheap as they get.
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: I couldn't bring myself to, but I figured I wouldn't have a chance to sell them once I move to the city center. Keeping the instruments on gag order? Now that would be a real waste.
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: How about it? Why don't you pick one? I remember you said you've always wanted your own guitar. I could give you a free textbook on how to play, too.
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: This discounted guitar... goes for a hundred and fifty certs... Enis says he earns three for every hour he works...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: L-Let me think about it...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Not like we can bring it with us. Might as well take it out and let everyone have some fun.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: We want to do something special that we can look back on before we all move out of this street.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Like what? Drink? Look at the sea? Set off some fireworks?
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: We'll invite all the old miners that we used to drink with and the other shopkeepers on the street, have them bring their friends and family—
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: How about we have a party at the empty plate the night before the eruption? A container party. Sounds cool, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: Mr. Costa.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Oh, the punk from White Volcano. What are you doing here? Don't you need to look after the shop?
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: We're preparing for our move, too.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: We don't have a lot of customers these days... If I don't come out to earn some cash, we all might just go hungry.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm sorry about Grandpa Mockingbird... May he rest in peace.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: He was getting on in years. It was going to happen...
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Perhaps he's in some other place, sharing his taste in coffee.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: No need to be so polite. Just a couple years ago, you were still a punk who would come out to watch my concerts at night instead of going to bed. Just call me Costa like before.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, it was the 'Corybantic Costa.'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm not so corybantic anymore. My guitar, bass, synth... Sold them all long ago.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Truth be told, I really miss sneaking into the venues with the adults, too. Those were the good times.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You'll get it once you get a little older. There are no such things as good times.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: All times are a waste of time. It's only after we waste our time away that we can bring our memories back out, dust them off, and think back on how great those times were.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Thinking back... I must've pissed Grandpa off so much back then.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: The city hall staffer squints at the cars on the street. The cars zoom past them, leaving behind a few streaks of silhouette in his vision.
So, Enis, if there's anything you want to do, do it now. Don't wait till everything you knew no longer resembled what they once were. By then, it's all too late.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Yeah... I will.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Costa taps Enis's shoulder and sighs.
The residents of the shopping district have, for the most part, agreed to the rebuilding proposal, and my work has come to an end, for the time being. With the way things are, this isn't so bad.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Life must go on.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Strange...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I haven't seen a single sheep on my way here...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We have to go now.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Yes. It's time.
attributes.name: Solemn Creature

attributes.content: The streets today seem awfully quiet.
Was it all... just a dream?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No... That letter... the rock, and the surfboard that flew right into the sky... They were all real...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele tries her hardest to think back on what proof she had that all the adventures she had the past few days were real, but the harder she digs into her memories, the less believable her memories become.
Mr. Dolly—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are you there?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are you still there—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The girl's voice is carried away by the wind.
Your blood-crystal density is fluctuating a little, but for the most part, it's still within the normal range...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You said you pass out suddenly. What do you mean by that, more specifically?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Dr. Ceylon, can Oripathy... cause hallucinations?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Theoretically, it's possible... What did you see?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Lots of Little Black Sheep, and they all talk to me...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: And... I don't know why, but it feels just like I've seen them before...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Well... That sounds like it could've been caused by stress.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: But it's weird... Some old miners have told me about similar hallucinations when they came in for consultations...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Let's keep an eye out for a few more days. During that time, make sure you take your medicine on time and get as much rest as you can. If you get any hallucinations again or feel unwell, come to me immediately.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: *sigh*... If only all my patients would be as cooperative as Eyjafjalla, things would be so much easier for me as a doctor. Not like a certain someone here who's always giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Stop chewing me out. I'm here for my follow-up and my medicine, am I not?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Alright, this counts as an improvement. As a way to encourage you, I won't charge you for this consultation.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But I have something I want to ask you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: A few days ago, I found this basket of obsidian on the shopping district. None of the shops nearby admitted that it was theirs. Do you have any clues about its origins?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Judging from their color, these obsidians are very similar to the one you gave me before... It could very well have been mined around the same time from the volcano.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It wasn't me! I promise! I haven't been near the volcano since I got infected!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: So you mean there are still people mining obsidian illegally.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Enis, what else do you know?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Well... I guess I'd be lying if I said I didn't know anything about it...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Don't try to fudge your way out of this. Out with it!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Dr. Ceylon, some of the workers here know you're the mayor's daughter. It was hard enough to get them to come to you for consultations. If you dig into who's mining obsidian...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: True, what they're doing's not right, but this might just be... a conflict of interest...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm me, and the mayor's the mayor. Why must I be grouped together with him?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I came back here this time because I wanted to do something for Siesta with my knowledge. The Rhodes Island office is my blood, sweat, and tears. He's got nothing to do with it!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: (It seems like Dr. Ceylon really doesn't like Mayor Herman...)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Maybe Ceylon isn't on very good terms with her father?)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Anyway, Enis, you know who the obsidian belongs to, right? Take me to them.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: It makes me feel kind of like I'm selling them out, but if it's for the greater good...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: A-Alright...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Take me with you. I can help identify obsidian!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No can do. Last time, you almost sneaked away. You aren't leaving here until you get enough rest.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Huh? What about me...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'll take you out to eat!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: After the night has shrouded the street, Adele steps outside the office.
A lone Little Black Sheep stands outside, staring blankly at the closed door.
Huh? Another hallucination?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What's going on? Didn't I just get some rest...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele goes around the Little Black Sheep and prepares to go back home.
The Little Black Sheep staggers a little and turns around from the office's door. It sways its head and turns on the miner's lamp on its back. The lamp shines and illuminates the path before Adele.
Adele takes a step forward, and steps onto the shadow cast by the lamp on the Sheep's back.
There's really a light...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: She turns around and hesitantly reaches her hand out and probes. Then, she feels some warm, fluffy wool.
Not a hallucination?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, I've seen you before. You're the sheep who ate the address off the letter. What's that you're carrying on your back... A miner's lamp?
attributes.name: Adele
